hero.text: If you can't explain it to a six-year-old, you don't understand it yourself - Albert Einstein

aboutMe.paragraph:
Hi there! This is my personal blog, where i write about programming and other closest technology.

I love programming, especially - JavaScript, React ‚ù§Ô∏è Redux, React Native, Java and related technologies.

Buy the way, this blog has written via React/Redux on frontend and Java/Spring on backend.

cookieAlert.text: This site uses cookies and similar technologies to provide you with the best user experience. By using this site, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this notice in relation to this type of files. If you do not agree to our use of this type of file, then you must set your browser settings accordingly or not use this site.

post_current.about_author: Hello üëã, my name is Yuri and I am the author of this blog. I am fond of programming and everything connected with it, if you have any comments or suggestions, leave a comment or contact me on one of the social networks.

about_blog.paragraph_1: This blog is dedicated to various areas of computing and information technology. Recordings and news articles are posted directly on the site. In addition, this blog contains links to other sources that may be useful to a novice programmer.
about_blog.paragraph_2: Unlike academic journals and articles, blog posts are written in an accessible language and understandable to a wide audience of readers.
